Adventurer Helper:
Say it again.
You need to kill Antelope Canyon, Canyon Antelope Slave, Drakolova Canyon Captive Drakolova Canyon Eye Savior Buffalo Slave, Eye of the Explorer, the Eye of Nightmare, Eye Watcher, Homunculus, Grendel Slave, Eye of Pilgrim, Senior homunculus, Eye Ruler and hellish Beagle, collect 45 Bloody Tears, and then take them Magister Justin in Goddard. Now time for you to move to the Wall of Argos. You understand? Long live the journey!
